description: This protocol is widely used in serum biochemical indexes detection, it provides an rapid and reliable technique for obtaining relative concentrations of multiple blood biochemical indices simultaneously.
before_start: All the standard samples of every index are kept at  4 ℃.
protocol_affiliation: College of Fisheries, Hubei Provincial Engineering Laboratory for Pond Aquaculture, National Demonstration Center for Experimental Aquaculture Education, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China,Institute of Parasitology, and Department of Animal Science, McGill University, Saint-Anne-de-Bellevue, QC H9X 3V9, Canada
authors: Honghao Zhao,Jasmine Chong,Rong Tang,Li Li,Jianguo Xia,Dapeng Li

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Blood samples (180 - 200 mL per tail) from 10 Ctenopharyngodon idellus per each group were taken from caudal vein without an anti-coagulating substance by injector puncture.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Blood samples (180 - 200 mL per tail) from 10 Ctenopharyngodon idellus per each group were taken from caudal vein without an anti-coagulating substance by injector puncture.

components.data: The blood samples were placed at room temperature for 30 minutes, then centrifuged at 3000 g for 30 minutes at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The blood samples were placed at room temperature for 30 minutes, then centrifuged at 3000 g for 30 minutes at room temperature.

components.data: The separated serum was stored at -80 ℃ until the serum biochemical indexes detection and analysis.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The separated serum was stored at -80 ℃ until the serum biochemical indexes detection and analysis.

components.data: The lactate dehydrogenase, glutamic-oxalacetic tansaminase, glutamic-pyruvic transaminase, alkaline phosphatase, total cholesterol, high density cholesterol, glucose, albumin, total protein and triglycerides were measured by automatic biochemistry analyzer (Hitachi 7020, Hitachi High Technologies, Inc., Ibaraki, Japan).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The lactate dehydrogenase, glutamic-oxalacetic tansaminase, glutamic-pyruvic transaminase, alkaline phosphatase, total cholesterol, high density cholesterol, glucose, albumin, total protein and triglycerides were measured by automatic biochemistry analyzer (Hitachi 7020, Hitachi High Technologies, Inc., Ibaraki, Japan).

components.data: Test kits (the standard samples of serum biochemical indexes) were purchased from the Nanjing Jiancheng Biochemical Corporation (Nanjing Jiancheng Biochemical Corporation, Nanjing, China), and the entire procedure was performed in accordance with the kit instructions.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Test kits (the standard samples of serum biochemical indexes) were purchased from the Nanjing Jiancheng Biochemical Corporation (Nanjing Jiancheng Biochemical Corporation, Nanjing, China), and the entire procedure was performed in accordance with the kit instructions.
